events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I'll assist you with your refund request right away.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue and process your refund?
Here is the photo of the product I got. It does not match the description or the item I ordered from your website.
Thank you for the photo. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and send a prepaid return label for the incorrect item.
Thank you for handling this promptly. I appreciate the quick refund and return instructions.
Your refund has been processed and return shipping label emailed. Please use it at your convenience to return the wrong item.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund and that the return process went smoothly. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since the refund has been completed and no additional issues reported, we have now closed your case. Thank you for contacting support.
We have sent you a short satisfaction survey. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
